title: 1990 Lincoln Mark VII Mark 7 LSC
item_description:
1990 Lincoln Mark VII Mark 7 LSC

Removal Note: This lot is only available for removal on Thursday, October 23, or Friday October 24, 2025, from 9:00AM to 3:30PM each day, by APPOINTMENT ONLY. Earlier removal of this lot will not be permitted. 

Specifications

  • Year: 1990
  • Make: Lincoln
  • Model: Mark VII
  • VIN: 1LNCM93E4LY776985
  • Current License: 6SFR908
    • Registration Expiration: 4/18/2012
    • 02/09/10 SALVAGED
    • PNO-REGISTRATION DEFERRED
    • 08/29/11 PREV LIC DPK5995
  • Odometer Reads: 111164
  • Key: Not Available
  • GVWR: 4825
  • Body Style: Coupe
  • Fuel Type: Gasoline
  • Transmission: Automatic
  • Tire Size: P225/60 R16

Exterior

  • Exterior Color: Maroon
  • Doors: Two

Interior

  • Interior Material: Vinyl
  • Interior Color: Gray

Probate Court Estate Note: This vehicle is behind sold on behalf of a probate estate. Application for Replacement Title, Transfer Form, Death Certificate, and and Probate Court Documents will be mailed approximately 1-2 weeks after auction removal. The Bidder shall not bid on behalf of another individual; the Bidder/Purchaser/DMV Registrant must be the same. The Probate Court Sells this vehicle "as-is" in unknown running condition and in planned non-operational registration, no smog will be performed by the Probate Court. The Buyer agrees to purchase the vehicle "as-is" and agrees to repair and smog vehicle. An "as-is" no-smog bill of sale must be signed by both the administrator of the probate estate and the buyer in an agreement to these stated terms. Buyer accepts they are fully responsible for all aspects of smog, repairs to smog, transfer, registration, taxes, and fees due to California DMV.
